english: Standard for the Tolerance of Heavy Metals in Pulses and Legume Vegetables
title: 豆類及豆菜類重金屬限量標準

articles.content: This Standard is prescribed in accordance with the provisions of Article 10 of the Act Governing Food Sanitation.

Maximum tolerance of heavy metals in pulses and legume vegetables shall meet the following table:
┌────────────┬────────┬────────┐
│Heavy metal             │Cadmium         │Lead            │
├────────────┼────────┼────────┤
│Maximum tolerance       │0.2             │0.2             │
│ ppm, wet weight basis）│                │                │
└────────────┴────────┴────────┘
This Standard shall be implemented from the date of promulgation.
